ygData.subject: Re: Throwing in a Monk Wrench...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am currently in Qeynos, and none of the monks there will train me either. I have also tried freeport.  The entire Monk guild is mad at me, and I need to find
ygData.messageBody:
I am currently in Qeynos, and none of the monks there will train me
either. I have also tried freeport. The entire Monk guild is mad at me,
and I need to find some way to get back on their good side.


>From: "Munk" <Munk@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
>To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Throwing in a Monk Wrench...
>Date: Fri, 2 Apr 1999 16:49:32 -0800
>
>From: "Munk" <Munk@...>
>
>I have heard that there is a way to recieve head bands in addition to
sashes
>for monks. I was told you must go to queynos and get it there.
>so if there are monks there, they may train you...
>
>Garan lvl 6 monk [E'Ci]
>Nafertina lvl 4 necro [Tunare]
>
>>From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>
>>
>>Well, I'm a monk, 7th level, and I accidentally killed a Monk NPC
>>(forgot to hit enter before talking, you've all been there probably).
>>Now all the monk guilds hate me, and will not train me. So two
>>questions:
>>
>>How can I get back on the good side of my guild?
>>and
>>Where can I train in the meantime?
